boardgame.name: Basari
バザリ
boardgame.description: Basari is a game of gem merchants competing in a marketplace_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;: racing, collecting, trading, and predicting what the other merchants will do._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To start the game, players receive 12 gemstones (3 each of 4 colors). _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn there will be a movement phase and an action phase:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;For movement, everyone simultaneously rolls their die and moves their markers around a track._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;They then choose one of three different actions to perform. The actions are:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- to take a variety of gems from a market stall, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- to immediately score from between 4 and 7 points, or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- to roll and move again and also collect points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The action cards are revealed simultaneously. If only 1 player chose a particular action, they simply perform that action. If 2 players chose the same action, they barter back and forth with gemstones. One player will eventually accept the other's offer of gems, and the other will take the action. If 3 or 4 players all chose the same action card, that action is cancelled. Note that in 4-player games, there will always be a conflict in choice of 3 actions, so much more negotiating goes on._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A new turn begins with everyone rolling their die, moving, then choosing and revealing their action cards. When any merchant piece completes a lap around the board, the round ends and bonus points are awarded based on who has the majority in each gem color and who has completed a lap. After three rounds, the game is over and the highest score wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Edel, Stein _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Reich_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Out of the Box Publishing (OBG 5555) BASARI... Step Right Up! Enter the street bazaar…the enticing sights, sounds and flavor of the marketplace are everywhere! In BASARI® players act as merchants who compete on the streets of a lucrative gem marketplace. Each round, players earn valuable points by haggling and bartering for precious gemstones. The player with the most points after three rounds wins BASARI. Adventure awaits in BASARI...
DOMESTIC SHIPPING: USPS PRIORITY 2-3 DAY mail with Delivery Confirmation = $9.99 or less, depending on your zip code
